An R app running in the browser, deployed via Github Pages

```{webr-r}

webr::install("modeldata")

fit = lm(ridership ~ Clark_Lake, data = modeldata::Chicago)
summary(fit)
```
Downsides: slow to load

Upsides: Free, no server required
